title: RPG and IBMi
description: A brief introduction/history of the programming language Report Program Generator (RPG) and IBMi, a midrange server specializing in business applications, reporting, and more.

title: Writing a Book with Docsify
description: A brief introduction to writing an eBook using a popular framework called Docsify. Docisfy primarily uses markdown, but additional JS, CSS, and plugins can be imported.

title: IBMi Fetch Code Util
description: A simple python utility for fetching code from multiple source members from IBMi via FTP. This was my first attempt at keeping IBMi code in my own personal git repository.

title: Game of Life in TSQL
description: Conway's Game of Life implemented in just TSQL. I generate the data for each organism over generations and animate frames using a bit of Python.

title: IBMi Book Chapters 1 and 2
description: Chapters 1 and 2 include an introduction to IBMi navigation and Control Language (CL) programming.

title: Writing an IBMi Syntax Highlighter for VS Code
description: A short introduction to writing a VS Code Syntax Highligter for IBMi languages such as RPG, CL, DDS, RPGLE, MI.

title: Sending a Text Message with SQL (IBMi)
description: A simple example of calling an API from DB2 SQL to send a text message using Twilio SMS API.

title: TRS-80 Twilio, Sending Texts like its 1983!
description: My entry to the Twilio Hackathon 2020 hosted at DEV. Sending a text message from a TRS-80 Model 100 using ESP8266 and Twilio SMS API.

title: Jupyter Notebooks + IBMi
description: A post to show how to setup a basic utility notebook to allow easy reports and data visualization using IBMi data.
